code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import"./Todoform.css";import Filter from'../Filter/Filter';import{Submit,LableChange}from"../../redusers/todoformReduser";import{addTodoItem,SetFilter}from"../../redusers/todoitems";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoForm(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var lable=useSelector(function(state){return state.todoform.lable;});var onSubmit=function onSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();dispatch(addTodoItem(lable));dispatch(Submit());};var onLableChange=function onLableChange(e){e.preventDefault();dispatch(LableChange(e.target.value));};var changeFilterAll=function changeFilterAll(){dispatch(SetFilter("all"));};var changeFilterActive=function changeFilterActive(){dispatch(SetFilter("active"));};var changeFilterDone=function changeFilterDone(){dispatch(SetFilter("done"));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Todos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filter,{changeFilterAll:changeFilterAll,changeFilterActive:changeFilterActive,changeFilterDone:changeFilterDone}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"ItemAdd d-flex",onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",onChange:onLableChange,placeholder:"neds",value:lable}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-secondary",children:"Add Item"})]})]});}export default TodoForm;
